title: Gloomy Dungeons Pro: Halloween v2013.10.17.1340
description:
PRO version og Gloomy Dungeons doesn't contain third-party advertisements. 
All episodes are available at once!

In the PRO version of Gloomy Dungeons we offer you to become real shooter with sniper rifle or bloody-hands maniac with chainsaw. Target, weapon, shotÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ are you ready to feel adrenaline in your blood?

Expected by fans this oldschool 3D shooter is already here to give you completely new levels, creepy monsters who dare to taste your blood, pool of weapons to try yourself a real shooter from machine-gunner to rocketeer and several hours of gameplay in dark subway tunnels with special secrets. 

For all fans of old action games, FPS games (First Person Shooters)! Experience heroic retro battles that have never been seen on your phone and tablet.
Use your sniper skills and agility of real soldier to complete all the episodes. 

More monsters, more blood, no escape from the dungeons, run to the end, kill everything is moving! Go forward to leave plenty of dead bodies after you. Dive into the most memorable action shooter ever. Experience the ultimate old style action fps with PC quality graphics and sounds.

WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new in your lovely 3D shooter Gloomy Dungeons 2: Blood Honor

- Easy and comfortable control: youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never played a shooter with such smooth and customizing controls.
- Automap with real-time hints.
- Get Ã¢â‚¬Å“Hands in bloodÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Ultimate ninjaÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, Ã¢â‚¬Å“I see dead monstersÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ and other achievements.
- Choose your level: from easy to nightmare to train your shooting skills.
- New better graphics, shadows, texture and music.
- New weapons (chainsaw/guns/rifles/rocket launcher) and monsters.
- Global map and level progress. Check out how many dead monsters you have in total.
- Graphics optimized for low and hi-res display such as Samsung Galaxy S4 or Samsung Galaxy Note
- Support for Zeemote and Nyko PlayPad (controller setup required).
- Lead your character to the top of the online leaderboards with a new ranking system!

What's New: (October 17, 2013)

Bug with invisible monsters is fixed for real.
Last episode is complete!
Two new scary monsters are waiting for you.
Other monsters have Halloween make-up.
Bug with sound fixed.
